group_1.narration: "What was the meaning of my wish?"
"When I see what's become of my family@and friends, who founded this land,@raised children, and prospered together,@I feel my days of fighting with pride@have been lost to the bygone past."
"This power was for slaying Witches@and bringing happiness to people,@not for murdering others for our gain."
"But as I see this conflict spiralling@out of control, the fact that my ideals have@been broken beyond repair permeates my mind,@urging me to understand this new reality…"
"To admit that the purpose to which@I had devoted myself was meaningless;@a fleeting and illusory dream…"

group_1.textRight: Miss Mikoto…?@Um, I'm sorry to interrupt…

group_1.textLeft: Who are you…?

group_1.textRight: I'm Kagome Satori.@I don't suppose you remember me…?

group_1.textLeft: I'm simply a record empowered by the Magia@Record.
If we've met before, I wouldn't remember.
What would you like to know about me?@Just don't ask anything unscrupulous.

group_1.textRight: Right…
Actually, I'm not here to ask about you.

group_1.textLeft: What is it, then?

group_1.textRight: I want to know more about the Witch who@swallowed Iroha.

group_1.textLeft: I think that is being documented in my book@as we speak.

group_1.textRight: We're giving it everything we've got to@overcome this Witch!
So will you tell us how to defeat it…?!
When we last spoke,
you knew a lot about this Witch!

group_1.textCenter: …Given I'm stored within Iroha, I suppose that@I'm in danger as well.

group_1.textRight: Thank you so much!

group_1.textLeft: But even once you know the trick, it might still@end in tragedy.

group_1.textRight: Will it be that difficult even with everyone@working together…?

group_1.textLeft: The Witch who stole the power from Tamaki's@Soul Gem...
It was a fission born from the mother Witch and@got retrieved alongside Tamaki's concept.
Thus, it managed to rejoin with the mother who@was lurking deep within Mizuna Castle.
Now she is trying to overturn history and@achieve her own vision of glory,
by empowering her offshoot Witches to kill@Magical Girls throughout history.

group_1.textRight: No way…

group_1.textLeft: This is a fact.
Tamaki understands that this parasite Witch@has been attached to her.
After all, I myself, a parasite of Tamaki,@also understands it. [chara:104400:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:104400:cheek_0][chara:104400:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:104400:lipSynch_1]*Giggle*

group_1.textRight: Even if all of that is true, I won't give up.@I'll hang onto hope until the very end.

group_1.textLeft: And as will I, until I can show you the tragic end@that will unfold.
…You seem ready, so I'll tell you its weakness.
Since it's a parasite, Iroha Tamaki and I can't@deal with it alone.
Which is why I'll entrust this duty to you.

group_1.textRight: Yes, by all means.
I'm here to learn from you, so please put@your trust in me.
The stories of Magical Girls end in sorrow…
Mikoto Sena chose annihilation in order to end@this misfortune…
I think I'm starting to understand her feelings@back then.
But now, she's decided not to give up@on the future, right…?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. That's why she gave me the power to create@a brighter future for everyone.
And I'm not giving up now.
That's why I want to somehow keep the Magical@Girls of the past alive…

group_1.textRight: Ugh…
…The Witch's power is so strong it's starting@to crush me…

group_1.textLeft: Me too…but…
I can still endure…@I WILL endure…

group_1.textRight: What about the Magical Girls of the past…?

group_1.textLeft: …They're still struggling against the interference@of the Witch who's taken us in.

group_1.textRight: I hope they can stop the Witch from growing…

group_1.textLeft: Yes, we've all nearly reached our limit…

group_1.textRight: That's…the Witch's weakness…

group_1.textLeft: Right, Tsuyu Mizuna, who was swallowed up@by this Witch long ago, discovered it…
I can't tell you exactly where it is.
But within that golden body, you can feel@the curses of two other Witches.

group_1.narration: The two Witches who have also been lurking@within Mizuna Castle continue to bind their foe@in an attempt to bring forth "divine punishment,"@indicating the weak points of their enemy@so that their vengeance may be enacted.
The two Witches are long dead and formless,@but even in the present day, their curse, @the very nature of Witches, is still carved deep.

group_1.textRight: *Pant* *Pant*
You who create the will for strife must be@vanquished…
If I can't beat it…@I can't become like Mama…
All my talk about the good of the people…@They'll just be empty words…
